characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per battle, a Voidraven can drop a void mine on an enemy unit it moves over in one of its Movement phases. After the Voidraven has moved, pick one enemy unit that it flew over. Then, roll three D6 for each VEHICLE or MONSTER in the unit, or one D6 for every other model in the unit, up to a maximum of 10 D6. For each roll of a 3+, the unit being bombed suffers a mortal wound.
